description: Elite League leaders Cardiff Devils come from behind to beat Nottingham Panthers 3-2 to end their two match winless run.
title: Elite League: Cardiff Devils 3-2 Nottingham Panthers
title_page: Elite League: Cardiff Devils 3-2 Nottingham Panthers - BBC Sport
maintext:
Elite League leaders Cardiff Devils came from behind to beat Nottingham Panthers 3-2 to end their two match winless run.
Mark Richardson had a shot strike the crossbar before Reid Duke put Devils ahead in the opening period.
Samuel Herr equalised for the visitors in the second period and Tim Doherty put Panthers ahead in the final period.
But Tyler Busch got Devils back level and Brett Perlini's powerplay goal secured the comeback victory.
Devils are away to Glasgow Clan in their next game on Friday, 10 January and face Manchester Storm away the following day.
